Bush “borrowed” from it repeatedly, to pay for his wars and tax cuts for the rich. Never paid it back. So now what, cut the benefits? That’s a lot of homeless grannies out there on the street living on catfood (thank God I have my military retirement). Obama is the first president who must decide how to deal with it. But the worst is yet to come.
